comment.author: 31859074@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called ARTE IN FOTOGRAFIA, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 56656338@N06
comment._content: I agree with Wellsman on his comment, such a great photo of the skyline in New York. One of the greatest and oldest cities in America, and a true inspiration for the American Dream. I recently went to NY, and it is great to see that they still appreciate the history behind the architecture and move to restore and share that history with the public.

comment.author: 32256914@N06
comment._content: Minimal restoration. Duotone enhancement.
